\~Chinese

\~English
Initialize application
Whether initialization is successfull \~Chinese
应用程序初始化
是否成功

\~English
(app:eto=3.0.2) Initialize application with the specified UI framework
UI framework code, set to null to use default framework Set this argument to true if not invoking ASEva.UIEto.App.Run to execute the GUI main loop Whether initialization is successfull \~Chinese
(app:eto=3.0.2) 以指定UI框架初始化应用程序
UI框架代号，设置为空则使用默认框架 若不调用 ASEva.UIEto.App.Run 执行界面主循环，则设置为true 是否成功

\~English
(api:eto=3.0.1) Initialize GPU rendering options (Only the first call is valid)
Whether to disable GPU rendering Whether to enable GPU onscreen rendering (If renderingDisabled is true, this setting is invalid) \~Chinese
(api:eto=3.0.1) 初始化GPU渲染选项，仅第一次调用有效
是否禁用GPU渲染 是否启用GPU在屏渲染，若renderingDisabled为true则此设定无效

运行应用程序
主窗口

\~English
Run application
The main window
\~Chinese

主窗口

\~English
Get current running OS's code, which is the same as ASEva.APIInfo.GetRunningOS
OS code, "unknown" if unrecognized \~Chinese
返回当前运行的OS代号，与 ASEva.APIInfo.GetRunningOS 结果一致
OS代号，若无法识别返回"unknown"

\~English
Get current running UI framework's code
UI framework code, "unknown" if ASEva.UIEto.App.Init is not called or initialization failed \~Chinese
返回当前运行的UI框架代号
UI框架代号，若未运行 ASEva.UIEto.App.Init 或初始化失败则返回"unknown"

\~English
Get the backend code of current running UI
UI backend code, null if ASEva.UIEto.App.Init is not called or initialization failed or there's no backend for current UI \~Chinese
返回当前运行UI的后端代号
UI的后端代号，若未运行 ASEva.UIEto.App.Init 、或初始化失败、或当前运行UI无后端则返回null

\~English
Get current running UI and UI backend's third party license notices
Key is title, value is notice \~Chinese
返回当前运行的UI框架和UI后端使用的第三方软件版权声明
键为标题，值为版权声明

\~English
Get current WebView backend code
WebView backend code, "unknown" if ASEva.UIEto.App.Init is not called or initialization failed \~Chinese
返回当前WebView使用的后台框架代号
当前WebView使用的后台框架代号，若未运行 ASEva.UIEto.App.Init 或初始化失败则返回"unknown"

Text Initial check state Initial enable state \~Chinese

Add check boxes at once
Text of each check box Initial check state of each check box. "null" indicated all are unchecked. If it's not null, you should guarantee the size is the same Initial enable state of each check box. "null" indicated all are enabled. If it's not null, you should guarantee the size is the same \~Chinese

各多选框的显示文字 各多选框的初始勾选状态，若为null则全部为未勾选，若非null则数组大小应与itemsText一致 各多选框的初始启用状态，若为null则全部启用，若非null则数组大小应与itemsText一致

构造函数

\~English
Constructor
Component ID of owner window or dialog class, for statistics of rendering time, set to null if not using Antialias option (Use the nearest option if not supported), default is 4x sampling Whether to request onscreen rendering (Use offscreen if unsupported), default is false Whether to request support of overlay (SupportOverlay will be false if unsupported), default is true Whether to request drawing text, default is true Whether to use OpenGL legacy API, default is true \~Chinese
构造函数
所属窗口组件或对话框组件ID，用于绘图时间记录与反馈，若不使用可输入null 请求抗锯齿选项(若不满足条件则使用最接近的选项)，默认为4倍抗锯齿 是否请求启用在屏渲染(若不支持则仍使用离屏渲染)，默认为false 是否需要支持被其他控件覆盖(若不支持则SupportOverlay属性为false)，默认为true 是否需要绘制文本，默认为true 是否需要使用OpenGL传统API，默认为true

\~English
[Optional] Called while new data arrived. If there's a sample buffer, use ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin to remove data outside the buffer range after adding new sample. In addition, since ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI won't be called while the child window is hidden, you can use ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample to perform background processing (ManualTriggerSample's frequency is 50Hz)
New data, can be ASEva.GeneralSample , ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample , ASEva.Samples.AudioFrameSample , ASEva.Samples.PointCloudSample , ASEva.Samples.BusDataPack , ASEva.Samples.SignalsData , ASEva.EventData , ASEva.SceneData , etc. \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在获得新数据时被调用。如果存在样本缓存，则需要在添加至缓存后使用 ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin 将缓存范围外数据移除。另外，由于窗口隐藏时将不会调用 ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI ，所以可以在此函数中的data为 ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample 时进行后台处理（ManualTriggerSample频率为50Hz）
新数据，包括通用样本 ASEva.GeneralSample , 手动触发器样本 ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample , 音频帧样本 ASEva.Samples.AudioFrameSample , 点云帧样本 ASEva.Samples.PointCloudSample , 总线数据 ASEva.Samples.BusDataPack , 信号数据 ASEva.Samples.SignalsData , 事件数据 ASEva.EventData , 场景片段描述 ASEva.SceneData 等类型

\~English
[Optional] Called while needed to reset data buffer
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要重置数据缓存时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while starting a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮开始时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while stopping a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮结束时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while updating the panel's UI. All UI related updating should be put here. Note that this function won't be called when the child window is hidden
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要更新界面时被调用。所有与界面相关的更新应全部放在此函数内实现。需要注意，窗口隐藏时将不会调用此函数

\~English
[Optional] Called in the main loop, for running modal dialog
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行模态对话

\~English
(api:eto=3.1.6) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for asynchronous calls
\~Chinese
(api:eto=3.1.6) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行异步调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while the size of the window container changed
Changed container size \~Chinese

变化后的容器尺寸

\~English

[可选实现] 在窗口控件销毁前被调用
